4. Rico Willis

Rico Willis
===========

![Rico Willis](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=241 "Rico Willis")

Rico Willis, Mayor Pro Tem
--------------------------

[Email Rico Willis](mailto:rwillis@pittsburgtexas.gov)

Biography
---------

Mr. Willis is a proud homegrown Camp County product. He is a graduate of Wiley College located in Marshall, Texas. Rico is married to Shannel Willis and together they have five beautiful children and one adorable grandchild.

He worked as the Director of Student Activities and Multicultural Affairs at Northeast Texas Community College for 12 years. His experience developing programs, activities, and events for NTCC prepared him to pursue his dreams of owning his own business. Currently, Rico Willis is investing as an entrepreneur being one of the owners of Racks, Daqz, and Axe in Pittsburg Texas. Being a business owner, Mr. Willis and his business partners play an important role in shaping the larger community through executing their strategic plan while maintaining their reputation for community service.

Rico Willis leads by creating ways for continuous improvement because innovation is what separates leaders from followers. He has a strong belief that community leaders are the key to building a strong community. Mr. Willis grew up benefiting from the resources that the City of Pittsburg had to offer; he takes pride in being able to give back to his hometown.
